Detailed Description

Lookup class.

This class is used to connect to retrieve lookup tables from a database.

License:
http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
Link:
http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework
Copyright:
2008 David Singer
Author:
David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
Version:
2.0.5
